title: ANIVIA'S WALL IS BUGGED BUG BUG BUGBUG
body:
Many shamps can go through it but the wall says IMPENETRABLE which means nothing cna go through it!

Vayne in particular can go through it... but his tumble clearly says "cannot go over walls" and caitlyn can go through it. 

Now can understand tristana, because she is going OVER it.

replies.body: Vayne can tumble through j4's wall, trundle's pillar not just anivia's wall but it is annoying as fk. And the q indicator on blackfrost skin is bugged as well.

I think you're reading into the word impenetrable too much, I think they used it to imply you can't just walk through it normally, not that no champion in existence can get past by any means available..
Caitlyn's net I understand cause that launches her through solid walls as well but as for Vayne's Q if it says that it should definitely not be allowed! I hope they fix that
